Text: FW Rejected Invoices for Bond PremiumsOriginal Message From Seibel Teresa Sent Wednesday September PM To Sharp Greg Cc Grisaffi Mary Ellis Lora Gunter Nichole Subject Rejected Invoices for Bond Premiums Importance High Greg It is my understanding that you have declined approving invoices for several bond premiums that are listed below All of these bonds are related to the PGE acquisition and are all issued under the name Enron Energy Marketing Corp and they have come up for renewal in the last couple of months We verified with the gas desk power desk and Karen Cordova in EES Legal that these bonds were still required All of these bonds have been renewed and issued however the bond premium still needs to be paid If you are not the right person to approve these please let me know who is I was directed to you Thank you for your assistance Teresa Bond To Pacific Gas and Electric Energy Service Provider Bond power Premium Bond To Pacific Gas and Electric Energy Service Provider Bond gas Premium Bond To New England Power Pool Financial Guaranty Bond power Premium Bond No To San Diego Gas Electric Contract Payment Surety Bond gas Premium
